name: KILL 'EM ALL (itch)
description:
OBJECTIVE:

STEAL THE GUN AND RUN.

KILL ROBOTS TO GAIN AIRTIME AND SPEED.

DONT LET IT GET YOU.

CONTROLS:

WASD - MOVEMENT

LEFT CLICK - SHOOT

R - RESET TO LAST CHECKPOINT

P - PAUSE

A GAME BY:

PEANUT - PROGRAMMING, ART

ANDREW SHANK - MUSIC, SOUND DESIGN, PROGRAMMING

NERO - PLAYTESTING, LEVEL DESIGN

GUEST APPEARANCE BY REBECCA L. LATSON

SONG NAME: CYBER SHOOTER
